amendment.description: To strike the Statutory PAYGO exemption and require balanced budgets in concurrent resolutions on the budget.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4930, under the order of 2/17/2022, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 45. Record Vote Number: 63.

action.text: Amendment SA 4930 proposed by Senator Braun. (consideration: CR S778-779; text: CR S778) To strike the Statutory PAYGO exemption and require balanced budgets in concurrent resolutions on the budget.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4930 proposed by Senator Braun.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4930, under the order of 2/17/2022, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 45. Record Vote Number: 63.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4930, under the order of 2/17/2022, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 45. Record Vote Number: 63.
